analysis.summary: NDA signature collection plan for agreement between YOOBROO, INC. and TONY LIU with effective date 2025-06-30. Document requires signature, date, and initials from both parties.
insights: Two-party mutual NDA requiring complete signature sets from both entities
Corporate entity (YOOBROO, INC.) will require authorized signatory with title
Individual party (TONY LIU) signs in personal capacity
Initials required suggests multi-page document with provisions needing acknowledgment
Future effective date (2025-06-30) indicates advance planning requirement
recommendations: Sequential signing order: YOOBROO, INC. signs first as disclosing party, then TONY LIU as receiving party
YOOBROO, INC. required fields: Authorized signatory name, title, signature, date, initials on each page
TONY LIU required fields: Full legal name confirmation, signature, date, initials on each page
Obtain corporate resolution or authorization letter for YOOBROO, INC. signatory if required
Use electronic signature platform with audit trail for remote execution
Set reminder for execution before effective date with sufficient lead time
Ensure both parties initial all pages containing key provisions (confidentiality scope, term, exceptions)
Verify signing authority for YOOBROO, INC. representative before circulation
Create signature page with clear labeling: 'YOOBROO, INC. By: [Name], Title: [Title], Date: [Date]' and 'TONY LIU, Date: [Date]'
Distribute fully executed copies to both parties immediately upon completion
